column4: People say 'ubuntu just works' Well, it doesn't. will all audio issues be fixed with 9.10?
my sound got a bit better after i removed pulseaudio, but still, i can't play mpd while using flash in a browser.
get real.. you can't have sound working "just lie that" in windows without installing the drivers for .. the motherboard, usb, audio, video, etc etc etc.. but I'm offtopic
